5 REM ----- GOTO CALCOLATO ------
6 REM ---------------------------
10 PRINTCHR$(147)
20 READA:IFA=256THENSYS49152:NEW
30 POKE49152+K,A:K=K+1:GOTO20
40 DATA 169,0,133,251,169,160,133,252,160,0,177,251,145,251,200,208,249,230,252
